TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaborationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PeerCollaborationPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PeerCollaborationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PeerCollaborationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

span.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值允许所有本地和 Intranet 区域的应用程序访问协作服务，并为 Internet 区域的应用程序授予任何权限。The default allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access collaboration services, and no permission is granted for Internet zone applications. 换而言之，如果默认权限已更改、 所有链接本地和站点本地应用程序有权访问对等协作服务，但全局应用程序没有访问权限。In other words, if the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-To-Peer collaboration services, but global applications have no access. 此类不是可以派生的。This class is not derivable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型的实例已不能访问权限，所保护的资源，或者它们具有对这些资源的完全访问权限不受限制。Instances of this type either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果状态为、实例将传递所有要求。If state is , the instance passes all demands. 如果状态包含任何其他值，实例失败的所有要求。If state contains any other value, the instance fails all demands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份实例授予同一资源的访问权限与原始的权限。A copy of a instance grants the same access to resources as the original permission.

summary.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于简单的 XML 对象模型，以便在安全系统中使用，不要使用作为常规的 XML 对象模型的轻量实现。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 以下语句都需要`true`的所有实现方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X 和 Y 表示不的对象引用`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 返回一个值等于 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 返回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`引用) 返回`null`引用。X.Intersect(a `null` reference) returns a `null` reference.

exception.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前是指定权限的子集，如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对访问的权限"*C:\example.txt*"是表示对访问权限的子集"*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 以下语句都需要`true`的所有实现方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X、 Y 和 Z 表示不是对象`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.IsSubsetOf(X) 返回`true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 返回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值，当且仅当 X 和 Y 表示相同的权限集。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果两者都返回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，X.IsSubsetOf(Z) 返回`true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. 如果 X 表示空[IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303)具有的权限状态为无对象和 Y 表示一个 IPermission 对象，它`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 返回`true`。If X represents an empty [IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303) object with a permission state of None and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也为空的权限，则复合集运算 X.Union(Z)。IsSubsetOf(Y) 也会返回`true`因为的两个空的权限是空的权限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情况下，权限类方法由基础结构使用，并且不应在应用程序中使用。In general, permission class methods are used by the infrastructure and are not intended for use in applications.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示由当前的所有操作的权限和指定的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 以下语句都需要`true`联合方法的所有实现。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 表示不是对象`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 返回具有 Y.Union(X) 返回的对象相同的值的对象。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.
